The current state indicates that my avatar (represented by '&') is positioned at (1, 13) and there is a pursuer at (12, 15). To reach the exit located at (6, 26), I should carefully plan my next move considering potential encounters with enemies.

Since I haven't moved yet, I will need to choose an action that brings me closer to the exit without moving into the line of sight of the pursuer. 

As I can see from the map, moving right to (1, 14) would keep me in a safe zone away from any immediate threats as well as providing access to nearby tunnels (notably at (2, 22)). Thus, I will execute the action to move right.

``` Action:2 ```
Moving right will keep me out of danger and allow me to explore additional options towards the exit.
